Posts.EditableText: When playing any text adventures, no matter what I type or click absolutely nothing happens. I have not found anybody who had the same issue so far.
Posts.HTML: When playing any text adventures, no matter what I type or click absolutely nothing happens. I have not found anybody who had the same issue so far.

Posts.EditableText:
Online or on desktop?

Online it's likely a connection issue and may be fixed later. If it's not, check any userscripts, ad blockers, or your firewall.

On desktop, make sure Quest is set to run as an administrator..
Posts.HTML:
Online or on desktop?

Online it's likely a connection issue and may be fixed later. If it's not, check any userscripts, ad blockers, or your firewall.

On desktop, make sure Quest is set to run as an administrator..
